text: The Workflow Bridge real-time collection agent collects data that has been sent by a Workflow Bridge forwarding agent. This section has the following subsections: Workflow Bridge Collection Agent Configuration Workflow Bridge Collection Agent Load Balancing and Collection Host Definition Workflow Bridge Collection Agent Events Workflow Bridge Collection Agent Transaction Behavior, Input/Output Data and MIM
title: Workflow Bridge Realtime Collection Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
